basic_information.scholarship_name: Outstanding 2nd Year Graduate Student Award in Master of Public Administration

description: This scholarship is awarded to a Political Science major who exemplifies high academic achievement in their specific area of study and class standing. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student majoring in Political Science - Public Administration Completion of 18 graduate hours or more Strong academic performance (GPA)

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
